Welcome to TrICal’s documentation!¶

Trapped Ion Calculator (TrICal) is a python package for simulating systems of trapped ions.

Installation¶

Clone the TrICal github repository using the following command:

git clone https://github.com/QITI/TrICal.git

Tutorial¶

Run the following commands in the root of TrICal github repository for the tutorial:

cd tutorial
jupyter notebook tutorial.ipynb

Packages and Modules

  • trical package
    • trical.classes package
      • trical.classes.empty module
      • trical.classes.potential module
      • trical.classes.spinlattice module
      • trical.classes.trappedions module
    • trical.data package
      • trical.data.data module
    • trical.misc package
      • trical.misc.constants module
      • trical.misc.linalg module
      • trical.misc.optimize module
      • trical.misc.polynomial module
      • trical.misc.setalg module
